sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-newsletter-banner', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], template: `

Sign up for our newsletter

Stay up to date with the roadmap progress, announcements and exclusive discounts feel free to sign up with your email.

We care about the protection of your data. Read our Privacy Policy.
`, styles: [ ] }) export class NewsletterBannerComponent { }
